message:
I am thinking...: The error indicates a mismatch in tensor sizes when computing the difference between logits with and without context. This suggests that the input sequences for generating logits are of different lengths, which is causing the size mismatch.

To resolve this, I need to ensure that the logits are computed over the same sequence length. One approach is to pad the shorter sequence to match the length of the longer one before computing the difference. Alternatively, I could slice the longer sequence to match the shorter one, but padding is generally safer to avoid losing information.

I will modify the implementation to pad the logits of the shorter sequence before computing the difference.

function.name: think

args.thought:
The error indicates a mismatch in tensor sizes when computing the difference between logits with and without context. This suggests that the input sequences for generating logits are of different lengths, which is causing the size mismatch.

To resolve this, I need to ensure that the logits are computed over the same sequence length. One approach is to pad the shorter sequence to match the length of the longer one before computing the difference. Alternatively, I could slice the longer sequence to match the shorter one, but padding is generally safer to avoid losing information.

I will modify the implementation to pad the logits of the shorter sequence before computing the difference.
